Title: ADC leader criticises Umahi over remarks on Southeast marginalisation
Summary: Comrade Adolphus Ude criticised Minister of Works Dave Umahi for claiming Igbos are content with Tinubu’s governance . Ude called Umahi an ‘efulefu’ for shortchanging Ndigbo .

Title: Hakimi boost as Morocco seek end to AFCON title drought
Summary: A social media picture of Achraf Hakimi in Rabat this week gladdened every Moroccan football supporter . Morocco prepare to host the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) from Sunday . The 27-year-old Paris Saint-Germain star was wearing sun glasses .

Title: Cherki inspires Man City, Newcastle strike late to reach League Cup semis
Summary: Rayan Cherki's stunning strike put Manchester City on their way to the League Cup semi-finals with a 2-0 win over Brentford . Holders Newcastle beat Fulham 2-1 on Wednesday .

Title: 2025 AFCON: The 24 coaches
Summary: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations kicks off in Morocco on Sunday . Algeria: Vladimir Petkovic (BIH) Angola: Patrice Beaumelle (FRA) Benin: Gernot Rohr (GER) Botswana: Morena Ramoreboli (RSA) Burkina Faso: Brama Traore

Title: Barcelona, Lyon and Chelsea reach Women’s Champions League quarters
Summary: Barcelona, Lyon and Chelsea reach Women’s Champions League quarters . Barcelona and Lyon clinch places in the quarter-finals of the Women's Champions League . Chelsea came from behind to beat Wolfsburg and qualify directly for the last eight .

Title: Alleged N2.2bn Contract Fraud: Court grants ex-labour minister, Ngige, bail
Summary: The court held that such discretion must be discharged judicially and judiciously without the imposition of conditions that would appear unreasonable and arbitrary .

Title: Mexvorin  Review 2025: Scam or Legit?
Summary: Mexvorin is a next-generation digital investment platform designed to provide users with structured access to cryptocurrency markets through advanced artificial intelligence . Rather than focusing solely on active trading, the platform emphasizes intelligent portfolio management, data-driven investment strategies .

Title: Israel launches series of strikes on Lebanon
Summary: Israel launches series of strikes on Lebanon . The military also said: "A short while ago, the IDF struck a Hezbollah terrorist in the area of Taybeh in southern Lebanon"

Title: NBA Anti-Corruption Committee marks Global Anti-Corruption Day 2025
Summary: Nigerian Bar Association Anti-Corruption Committee (NBAA-CC) stands in solidarity with global community in commemorating anti-corruption Day on December 9, 2025 . NBA Anti-Cruption Committee stands in firm solidarity with the global community .

Title: AFCON: heritage, legends and intrigues of the upcoming tournament
Summary: The 35th edition of the Africa Cup of Nations kicks off in Morocco on December 21 . The tournament has long gone beyond being a sporting event, becoming a cultural and historical phenomenon in Africa . AFCON has a rich heritage that reflects the diversity and spirit of the continent .

Title: Police kill two suspected kidnappers in Rivers, rescue victim
Summary: Rivers State Police Command has said its operatives have neutralised two suspected kidnappers and rescued a female victim along Ozuaha Road in Obio/Akpor Local Government Area of the state . The command said the suspects were gunned down after they opened fire on operatives who stormed their hideout based on credible intelligence . The victim was rescued unh

Title: Don seeks simplified teaching of science, tech subjects
Summary: Prof. Adebisi Awodun has advocated the simplification of the teaching of science and technology subjects in schools to enhance students’ interest and performance . The don spoke in Ekiti on Thursday while delivering an inaugural lecture titled ‘Refocusing Physics pedagogies: Blueprint to potent corollaries’

Title: Paperless revolution: Nigeria hits 100% digital compliance across federal ministries
Summary: The Federal Government has announced that all 31 federal ministries and departments have achieved full compliance with digital operations . Head of the Civil Service of the Federation, Mrs Didi Walson-Jack, said the development marked a major milestone in public service reform . She said the establishment of special “war rooms” to ensure speed and accountability

Title: Yuletide: FCT CP orders deployment of over 2,000 personnel to worship centres, others
Summary: 2,202 police officers have been deployed across the territory in line with the 2025 festive season operational order . The deployment is aimed at ensuring a peaceful, secure, hitch-free celebration for all residents and visitors . Police personnel have been stationed at places of worship, recreational and event centres, major highways, motor parks and other public spaces .

Title: PHOTOS: Lagos CJ swears in 126 notaries public
Summary: The Chief Judge of Lagos State, Justice Kazeem Alogba, has officially sworn in 126 new Notaries Public, including 11 who participated virtually, in a ceremony held at the Osborne High Court Complex, Ikoyi, Lagos on Wednesday .
